channel.title: Posts on Achilles' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Achilles' Blog

item.title: Hello, void!
item.description: Who am I? A -mainly- self-tought software engineer, loved computers since I was little, and trying my best to understand them and make them do amazing things. I started programming after I got my first computer at the age of 13, and the rest is history. I am fascinated with low-level, compiler design, and back-end related programming but I occasionally do some front-end and game dev work, which I may talk about on this blog.
